In Nov 2023, I was invited for a talk about my career journey by the Oxford Biochemical Society. I talked about my career path from academia to the industry, presenting highlights from various stages, my decision to transition to industry, what I currently do as a Bioinformatics Engineer, and insights gained along my career journey.
